name: Shapeshifter Style
description: You can shift your physiology without fully changing your shape, giving you an advantage in battle.
prerequisites: Base attack bonus +3, change shape ability, shapechanger subtype
benefit: You reshape your body, gaining one of the following benefits. You choose the benefit when you enter the style, and while in the style you can change the benefit as a swift action.
special: A character with the wild shape class feature counts as having the change shape ability and shapechanger subtype for the purpose of meeting this featâ€™s prerequisites.
